results.title: beta-Adrenoreceptor antagonists reduce cancer cell proliferation, invasion, and migration.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: We investigated the efficacy of @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, and @CHEMICAL_ICI_118551 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C026777 @@@ICI118,551@@@ on proliferation, migration, and invasion of non-stimulated @<m>DISEASE_Hereditary_Breast_and_Ovarian_Cancer_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D061325 @@@breast@@@ (@CELLLINE_CVCL:0031 @@@MCF7@@@), @DISEASE_Colonic_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D003108 @@@colon@@@ (@CELLLINE_CVCL:0320 @@@HT-29@@@), and hepatocellular (@CELLLINE_CVCL:0027 @@@HepG2@@@) @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@ cells.

citations.NLM: Işeri OD, Sahin FI, Terzi YK, Yurtcu E, Erdem SR, Sarialioglu F. beta-Adrenoreceptor antagonists reduce cancer cell proliferation, invasion, and migration. Pharm Biol. 2014 Nov;52(11):1374-81. PMID: 25026350
